parse.title: Module:SpellData/data
parse.text:
Module:SpellData/data has the following documentation.

Contains all data for all active & removed summoner spells in League of Legends. The map codes shown here are exclusively used for the purposes of this Module.

Please be aware that Smite and its upgrades share some parameters. Changes in Smite's data most likely will affect the upgrades. Make sure to double-check that nothing is lost between revisions. Removed upgrades should NOT use ANY data from the live version of Smite; if an upgrade is removed, all missing parameters must be manually added! 

Spell name = table: Name of summoner spell, as capitalized in game and across the wiki
  link      = string: override the article link to article if it differs from the spell's defined name
  cooldown  = string: cooldown in seconds
  recharge  = string: recharge time in seconds (if applicable)
  charges   = string: number of maximum charges (if applicable)
  level     = string: required player level to unlock the summoner spell
  range     = string: cast range
  stealth   = string: set to "true" if it breaks stealth; omit otherwise
  maps      = table: map/mode availability
    sr        = boolean: available on Summoner's Rift
    ha        = boolean: available on the Howling Abyss
    tt        = boolean: available on the Twisted Treeline
    nb        = boolean: available in Nexus Blitz
    cs        = boolean: available on the Crystal Scar
  effect    = string: effect 1
  effect2   = string: effect 2
  effect3   = string: effect 3
  removed   = boolean: set to "true" if removed; omit otherwise
  patch     = string: if removed, the patch of removal

-- <pre>
